questions.q: What is the MAIN purpose of applying wood finish?
options: To protect and enhance the wood's appearance
To make the wood waterproof permanently
To glue pieces of wood together
questions.answer: To protect and enhance the wood's appearance

questions.q: Which finish penetrates deeply into the wood fibers and enhances grain patterns?
Why is sanding between coats of finish important?
options: It removes all previous finish layers
It creates a rough surface for the next coat to bond
It prevents the finish from drying too fast
questions.answer: It creates a rough surface for the next coat to bond

questions.q: Which of these is considered a clear protective finish for wood?
What is the first step before applying any wood finish?
options: Apply a thick coat of varnish immediately
